_header: The help of Christ of wane is all wit
Subjects: Christ, prayers to; prayers, to Christ; sermons, verse in
_description: A prayer for Christ’s aid through life and at death, in a Latin sermon — four lines, abbb

ArrBM184.Transcription:
þe help of crist of wan is al wit& socur vs at þys
                    bygynnyngspede & forp vs mal oure lyuyng& grant vs hys blys in
                    ovr hennys Eyndyng
